title: Farmer’s Pampered Wife: Farming Crops To Raise A Bun - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient Times   Childcare   Cooking   Doctors   Farming   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Mu Xiqian   沐茜茜
description:
When she opened her eyes, she became the well-known ugly woman in the village and there was a soft little bun in front of her plus an instant hunter husband. 

Lin Xiaoye felt pressured, but with a silver needle in hand, she started treating illnesses and saving people to earn a fortune, kissing her husband, abusing scums, raising a bun, planting crops and living a good life. 

Wait, what? Her husband is a god of war? And an outstanding founding minister? The emperor even begged him? How dare he hide this from her? 

Scram and sleep in the hall!>
